explanation: [0-0] A shirtless man in blue shorts stands at the edge of a black mudflat, looking directly at the camera. The mudflat is surrounded by green vegetation, and the blue sky is dotted with clusters of white clouds. The white caption "Places On Earth That Don’t Feel Real" is displayed in the center of the screen, along with a "囧" emoticon. Below the caption, there is a white caption "France" sandwiched between two French flags.

[0-4] The man turns towards the mudflat and starts running, taking a big leap into the mud. To his left, a man in a red T-shirt and dark shorts is standing and laughing, while a woman in a white hat lies on the mud. Another man in a turquoise shirt is running towards where the man landed, observing the scene. Then, the screen fades to black, and a red "location" icon appears in the center with the white caption "Mont Saint Michel." Below the caption, there is a "crown" symbol and a "castle" symbol.

[4-8] The scene shifts to a woman with long hair in a white dress. With her back to the camera, she runs across a vast grassland towards a building in the distance, with the afterglow of the setting sun illuminating the sky. The video transitions quickly, showing the building situated in the vast sea, merging with the horizon. Then, the video shifts to a moving perspective, traveling along a road, with a clear view of the building in the sea on the upper left. Subsequently, the screen fades to black again, displaying a red "location" icon in the center and the white caption "Serpent d’ocean." Below the caption, there is a symbol representing "a blue ocean" and a symbol of "a green snake."

[8-12] The scene changes to a murky sea with an orange beach. A giant snake skeleton stands in the water, its head facing the camera, its body curved and coiled on the sea, and its tail extending into the distance. Then, the camera focuses on the snake skeleton, now situated on dry sand. Immediately after, the shot cuts back to the snake skeleton in the sea, with a person dressed in black standing on the beach, gazing at the skeletal remains. The screen fades to black again, still displaying a red "location" icon and the white caption "Calanques d’En-Vau." Below the caption, there is a symbol representing a "beach umbrella" and a symbol of "a person surfing in green clothing."

[12-15] Subsequently, the video transitions to a person wearing only dark blue shorts jumping off a khaki-colored rock into blue-green seawater. Surrounding the lake is a towering grayish-white mountain range. As the man falls into the water, the camera pans to show two people rowing a boat on the lake. Then, the video cuts to a woman with long hair in white shorts standing on a cliff, her back to the camera as she walks towards the edge. The surrounding cliffs are sparsely covered with green vegetation, and the seawater between the cliffs is azure, blending with the blue sky.
